view_and_manage_peope: [CY] View and manage people who have been added to
add_employees_if: [CY] Add employees if they need to file with Companies House. You can choose if they need to access other authorised agent services.
you_can_remove_people: [CY] You can remove people from the account at any time.
you_will_need_to_use: [CY] You will need to use this to file on paper or using software.
tell_us_about_any_changes: [CY] Tell us about any changes to the agent's details.
tell_us_about_aml: [CY] You must tell us about any changes to the Anti-Money-Laundering (AML) registration within 14 days.
you_can_use_this: [CY] , you can use this service to tell us about a person whose identity you have verified.
tell_companies_house_id: [CY] Tell Companies House you have verified someone's identity
